price: Allah, osim Koga drugog Boga nema, Živi je i Samoopstojeći Održavatelj.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
